text: @GOPLeader Let me be clear. I don't give a f*** if I have to wrap myself from head to toe in safety gear, and have to seim through a sea of coronavirus, I'm voting every motherf***ing @GOP on my ballot out of office.  Starting with the @realDonaldTrump and his cronies.
